data.title: 10- or 12-Day Tour of Nepal from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Trek through the Himalayas during this guided tour of Nepal; air is not included

data.title: 12-Day Tour in India with Yoga and Meals from Bohemian Tours
data.shortDescription: Hike and practice yoga in the Himalayas, enjoy vegetarian meals, and see the Taj Mahal on this 12-day tour of India; airfare is not included

data.title: ✈ 10- or 13-Day Bali and Dubai Trip w/ Air from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Relax on the pristine beaches of Bali and take in the futuristic architecture of glitzy Dubai

data.title: ✈ 10-Day China Tour with Air from InterTrips
data.shortDescription: Tour and explore Beijing, cruise along Yangtze River, and visit Chongqing in this 10-day China vacation

data.title: ✈ 10-Day Dubai and Egypt Vacation with Air from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Visit historic pyramids in Egypt then explore the dynamic city of Dubai on your own

data.title: ✈ 10-Day Thailand Tour with Air from Affordable World
data.shortDescription: See Bangkok’s busy streets and Phuket’s pristine beaches on this 10-day tour of Thailand, which includes 4- and 5-star hotels

data.title: ✈ 10-Day Tour of China with Air from Rewards Travel China
data.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in metropolises like Beijing and Shanghai and see ancient wonders such as the Great Wall of China on this 10-day tour

data.title: ✈ 10-Day Tour of Japan and China w/Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Gleaming Buddhist temples, Mount Fuji, and Beijing’s Forbidden City await you on this 10-day tour of Japan and China; air is included

data.title: ✈ 11-Day Tour of Central Europe with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: Stroll through Bavarian Germany’s streets and enjoy a lake cruise in Austria during this 11-day tour of four countries in Central Europe

data.title: ✈ 11-Day Tour of Poland with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: See Warsaw, Kraków, Gdańsk, and more of Poland’s most notable sites on this 11-day tour with airfare

data.title: ✈ 12-Day Australia & Hong Kong Trip w/Air from Down Under Answers
data.shortDescription: Take a trip to Australia and Hong Kong, and visit both the metropolitan and more natural parts of the regions

data.title: ✈ 7- or 15-Day Tour of India with Air from Indus Travels
data.shortDescription: Visit the Taj Mahal at sunrise and see the pink-sandstone buildings of Jaipur on a 7- or 15-day tour of India with stops including Delhi

data.title: ✈ 7-Day Dubai Vacation with Emirates Air from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Explore Dubai’s spice market, spend a day on the beach, or go skiing in one of the largest malls in the world; nonstop air is included

data.title: ✈ 8- or 10-Day Maldives Vacation with Air from Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Relax on a white-sand beach or scuba-dive beneath crystal-clear waters on this stress-melting vacation in the Maldives; air is included

data.title: ✈ 8- or 10-Day Tour of Greece w/ Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Visit a mix of ancient and modern sites, resting up at 4-star hotels in Athens and the Greek islands in between; air is included

data.title: ✈ 8- or 9-Day Asia Tour with Air from Affordable World Tours
data.shortDescription: Choose between an 8-day tour of Hong Kong and Taipei and a 9-day tour of Taiwan; both include luxurious hotels rated 4 or more stars

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Tour of Vietnam with Air from Gate 1 Travel
data.shortDescription: Surround yourself with beauty and history in Vietnam as you travel to Ho Chi Minh City, Halong Bay, and Hanoi; air is included

data.title: ✈ 8-Day Vacation in Athens and Istanbul with Air from go-today
data.shortDescription: Discover the ancient sites and modern appeal of Athens and Istanbul on this 8-day vacation; airfare and daily breakfast are included

data.title: ✈ 9- or 12-Day Bali and Singapore w/Air – Pacific Holidays
data.shortDescription: Unwind on two islands in Southeast Asia with this 9- or 12-day vacation in Bali and Singapore

data.title: ✈ 9-Day Tour of Bali and Singapore with Air from Globotours
data.shortDescription: Get a double dose of island life on this 9-day vacation in Bali and Singapore, which includes premium accommodations and half-day city tours
